name: Adix
description: Adix is an innovative shop and earn AI platform that leverages blockchain technology to offer a commission-free, subscription-based service akin to Netflix, combined with the functionality of the best shopping experience. The platform integrates Web3 features such as Shop to Earn, NFTs, and SocialFi elements, providing both brands and customers with unique advantages, Adix is poised to revolutionize the eCommerce industry. Our fully diluted valuation (FDV) is USD 30 million, and we aim to disrupt traditional Online shopping by eliminating commissions, enhancing profitability, and delivering genuine savings and exclusive experiences to shoppers
